article_title: Business and religion collide in Conestoga Wood Supreme Court contraceptive coverage case
article_text: Suzanne Cassidy is a Lancaster Newspapers reporter. She can be reached atscassidy@lnpnews.com. You can also follow @SuzCassidyLNP on Twitter.

og.description: As a local cabinetmaking business takes its case to the Supreme Court, other local business people of faith weigh in.
